RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions Class Reference

#include <xmloptions.h>

List of all members.

Detailed Description

Used to store client options.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::xmlOptions (  ) 

The default constructor.

It sets the filename field to ../config/options.xml and calls the refresh method.

bool RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::saveSnapshot ( const char *  snapName,
tOptionPanelList *  panels 
)

Saves the given snapshot with the current name.

This function is called bu the OptionManager when it may save a snapshot.

Parameters:
snapName The name of the snapshot
panels The list of panels to save
Returns:
true if the operation is succesfull, false if an error occured

Definition at line 201 of file xmloptions.cpp.

void RainbruRPG::Options::xmlOptions::loadPanel ( TiXmlElement *  snapNode,
OptionPanel *  panel 
) [private]

Loads a panel from the xml file.

For a panel, loads all buttons. First, we get the xml element of the panel (by its name), then, we call loadButton(panelXmlNode, button) for each button.

Parameters:
panel The panel that will be feed
snapNode the parent snapshot xml node

Definition at line 333 of file xmloptions.cpp.
